name: The Key (itch) (Emman Pangan)
description:
Get the key, unlock the door.  CAUTION: This game has screen shake. And if you encounter an ERROR MESSAGE just click on "OK", the game will load shortly. Description:
  • A little bit of puzzle - platformer.
  • The game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
  • Theme: "REWIND"
  • Idea: The key will be controlled by the Magi by using his hat. He can't control his own time, but he can control other inanimate things like keys, for example.
  • It is like the Braid but you can't control your own time loop .
Controls:
  • Right = Right Arrow / D
  • Left = Left Arrow / A
  • Jump = Space
  • Rewind = Z
Credits:
  • Abstraction - Princess Quest (Background Music)
  •  Daniel Linssen - m6x11 (Game Font, except Title)
Explanation:

If you are not sure on how this game is incorporated with the theme here it is:

The rewind is your power to rewind the position of the key.

And if still you are not sure on that concept, here's another:

Just think about the colors used in this game, the game paid its tribute for the classic games like Pokemon Yellow for example.
